definitions.definition: An article of clothing, usually worn by women and girls, that hangs from the waist and covers the lower part of the body.
The part of a dress or robe, etc., that hangs below the waist.
A loose edging to any part of a dress.
Women collectively, in a sexual context.
Border; edge; margin; extreme part of anything.
The diaphragm, or midriff, in animals.
To be on or form the border of.
definitions.example: The plain was skirted by rows of trees.

definitions.definition: To move around or along the border of; to avoid the center of.
To cover with a skirt; to surround.
To avoid or ignore (something); to manage to avoid (something or a problem); to skate by (something).
definitions.example: He skirted the issue of which parties to attend by staying at home instead.
